[h1] Simplesmente fantástico!!! [/h1]

 A arte e ambientação são simplesmente incríveis, os puzzles são ótimos e necessitam que você veja varias perspectivas de um mesmo problema, fazendo você se sentir um verdadeiro rato de laboratório. O multiplayer não necessita nem de comentarios, é maravilhoso, consegue arrancar risadas de qualquer um e é um ótimo de juntar as pessoas nesse tempo de crise kk. A comunidade também é magnifica, com mapas completissimos e  modificações [i] esplendorosas [/i] que fazem todas as horas passadas nesse jogo valerem totalmente a pena. 12/10
Get a Friend and have a good time.

Simply amazing, I recommend playing Portal first and then Portal 2 for the ultimate story experience.  There is also a comic called 'Lab Rat' that forges a bridge between Portal and Portal 2. 
If you're still doubting whether or not to play this, I say go for it. One of the best games I ever played.
да да это вещь которое стоит поиграть

Great for beginners like myself but also a classic for any puzzle game lover looking for their next challenge. Excellent graphics, brilliant narrative and funny commentary, hits every point for a good game in my eyes. Difficulty increases in good small increments making it easy to progress but it's definitely challenging enough to keep you entertained. Multiplayer is brilliantly done with a whole separate set of tasks designed for team play and would be ideal for an experienced player wanting to guide a friend through the game before they play alone. It would also be excellent for an experienced gamer to wind down or just play a less time pressured game. It's pretty difficult to die and it's fun, engaging but also not super high stress.
Весьма не плохая игра, рекомендую к покупке.
